game.name: The Message from Deep Space
game.categories: Single-player, Captions available, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mission: Translate an interstellar message, humanity's first contact from beyond this planet --- Starting with our only common ground, the universal languages of math & science, overcome the extraterrestrial language barrier and uncover the message's meaning.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mission: Translate an interstellar message, humanity's first contact from beyond this planet --- Starting with our only common ground, the universal languages of math & science, overcome the extraterrestrial language barrier and uncover the message's meaning.
